creator: anders.zellin@telia.com
text:
When installing TomCat 4.0, the program find my jdk as jdk1.3.1_01.
But I'm using jdk1.3.1_03!!
What can I do about it?

Hope for help.

Depending on which version you are using, the installer will use the JAVA_HOME
environment variable to find your JDK. So you need to update that before running
the installer.
If the variable is not present, the installer will attempt to use the registry.
creator: remm@apache.org
